weapons.name: Lustrous Razor
weapons.description: Gaze upon this Broadblade, its sharp edges gleaming in the frigid air. Wield it to feel power coursing through you like a raging river.

skill.name: Stormy Resolution
skill.description: Increases Energy Regen by 12.8%/16%/19.2%/22.4%/25.6%. When Resonance Skill is cast, Resonance Liberation DMG Bonus is increased by 7%/8.75%/10.5%/12.25%/14%, stacking up to 3/3/3/3/3 times. This effect lasts for 12/12/12/12/12s..

weapons.name: Verdant Summit
weapons.description: The ancient mountain stands tall, its peak reaching towards the sky. A river flows for thousands of years, forming the blade of a powerful weapon. As it is unsheathed, a powerful dragon's roar echoes through the heavens and earth, causing the sea to churn. This awe-inspiring weapon strikes fear in all who witness its might.

skill.name: Swordsworn
skill.description: Increases Attribute DMG Bonus by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24%. Every time Intro Skill or Resonance Liberation is cast, increases Heavy Attack DMG Bonus by 24%/30%/36%/42%/48%, stacking up to 2/2/2/2/2 time(s). This effect lasts for 14/14/14/14/14s.

weapons.name: Ages of Harvest
weapons.description: Each swing of the blade reveals the flow of time and the change of the stars. The sword embodies all things, uniting them into one. Its gentle aura seems capable of dissolving the indestructible, whether it's millennia-old ice or the stagnation of time.

skill.name: Divine Blessing
skill.description: Grants 12%/15%/18%/21%/24% Attribute DMG Bonus. Casting Intro Skill gives the equipper Ageless Marking, which grants 24%/30%/36%/42%/48% Resonance Skill DMG Bonus for 12/12/12/12/12s. Casting Resonance Skill gives the equipper Ethereal Endowment, which grants 24%/30%/36%/42%/48% Resonance Skill DMG Bonus for 12/12/12/12/12s.

weapons.name: Discord
weapons.description: A descending adagio. This broadblade dominates the battlefield with the power of discordance. The curtain never falls on a masterpiece.

skill.name: Ceaseless Aria
skill.description: When Resonance Skill is cast, restores 8/10/12/14/16 Concerto Energy. This effect can be triggered 1/1/1/1/1 time(s) every 20/20/20/20/20s.

weapons.name: Broadblade#41
weapons.description: An improved version of a mass-produced broadblade model developed in Huanglong. With its formidable performance and innovative technologies, this broadblade carries a weight only to be wielded by seasoned warriors.

skill.name: Veteran
skill.description: When the Resonator's HP is above 80%/80%/80%/80%/80%, increases ATK by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24%. When the Resonator's HP is below 40%/50%/60%/70%/80%, gives 5%/6.25%/7.5%/8.75%/10% healing when dealing Basic Attack DMG or Heavy Attack DMG. This effect can be triggered 1/1/1/1/1 time(s) every 8/8/8/8/8s.

weapons.name: Dauntless Evernight
weapons.description: A weapon designed to commemorate the Midnight Rangers' preparedness. "Autumn fades in endless nights, ready blades gleam with silent might."

skill.name: Battlebound
skill.description: When Intro Skill is cast, increases ATK by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16% and DEF by 15%/18.75%/22.5%/26.25%/30%, lasting for 15/15/15/15/15s.

weapons.name: Helios Cleaver
weapons.description: The Broadblade born from the aerial phenomenon. The blacksmith incorporates the feelings of witnessing the alien star into the weapon, making it look hollow and light, but it can exert the invincible gravity of the starfall.

skill.name: Plasma Recoiler
skill.description: Within 12/12/12/12/12s after Resonance Skill is cast, increases ATK by 3%/3.75%/4.5%/5.25%/6% every 2/2/2/2/2s, stacking up to 4/4/4/4/4 time(s). This effect can be triggered 1/1/1/1/1 time(s) every 12/12/12/12/12s. When the number of stacks reaches 4/4/4/4/4, all stacks will be reset within 6/6/6/6/6s.

weapons.name: Autumntrace
weapons.description: This Broadblade is a ceremonial weapon used in Huanglong's Magistrate Inauguration Ceremonies. The golden ginkgo leaf pattern symbolizes Huanglong's resilience, thriving in a world that has left it behind.

skill.name: Edge Direction
skill.description: Increases ATK by 4%/6.2%/8.4%/10.6%/12.8% upon dealing Basic Attack DMG or Heavy Attack DMG, stacking up to 5/5/5/5/5 time(s). This effect lasts for 7/7/7/7/7s and can be triggered 1/1/1/1/1 time(s) every 1/1/1/1/1s.

weapons.name: Waning Redshift
weapons.description: A prototype weapon designed by the Black Shores for elite combatants. This broadblade takes its name from the fate of a blazar—a galactic nucleus whose blinding radiance pierces the cosmos, shining unmistakably across billions of light years.

skill.name: Intergalactic Gaze
skill.description: Casting the Resonance Skill grants 6/7/8/9/10 Resonance Energy and increases ATK by 10%/12.5%/15%/17.5%/20%, lasting for 16/16/16/16/16s. This effect can be triggered once every 20/20/20/20/20s.

weapons.name: Meditations on Mercy
weapons.description: This weapon draws its design inspiration from the play—Meditations on Mercy. In the brief pauses between each swing, a warrior wrestles with an inner conflict: to bring down righteous punishment or extend a hand of redemption? Behind every clash of steel is the struggle between wrath and mercy.

skill.name: Rhetoric
skill.description: Dealing DMG to enemies with Negative Statuses increases the wielder's ATK by 4%/5%/6%/7%/8% for 10/10/10/10/10s. This effect can be triggered 1 time per second, stackable up to 4/4/4/4/4 times.

weapons.name: Broadblade of Night
weapons.description: May victory prevail the lasting night. In addition to the sworn oath of protection, this broadblade also carries the resolution of those fighting souls.

skill.name: Valiance
skill.description: When Intro Skill is cast, increases ATK by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16%, lasting for 10/10/10/10/10s.

weapons.name: Originite: Type I
weapons.description: To create new Tacetite weapons, the Huaxu Academy designed this test Broadblade for technical verification. Its main feature is healing through attacks, improving the physical abilities of Resonators while exhibiting impressive weapon performance.

skill.name: Temperance
skill.description: When Resonance Skill is cast, heals 3%/3.75%/4.5%/5.25%/6% of the Resonator's Max HP. This effect can be triggered 1/1/1/1/1 time(s) every 12/12/12/12/12s.

weapons.name: Broadblade of Voyager
weapons.description: The Broadblade provided by the Pioneer Association for the explorers is brightly colored, not easy to lose, hard in texture, and can cope with various extreme environments for a long time, and is very popular among the explorers.

skill.name: Long Journey
skill.description: When Resonance Skill is cast, restores 8/9/10/11/12 Resonance Energy. This effect can be triggered 1/1/1/1/1 time(s) every 20/20/20/20/20s.

weapons.name: Guardian Broadblade
weapons.description: The first Jinzhou Magistrate, in memory of the mysterious person who helped defend the border and build the city, created the Guardian series under his guidance. Today, it has become an indispensable cornerstone in the development of new weapons.

skill.name: Consensus
skill.description: Increases Basic Attack DMG Bonus and Heavy Attack DMG Bonus by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24%.

weapons.name: Beguiling Melody
weapons.description: Forged from the scale of Jué, this weapon resembles a musical instrument more than a tool of destruction.

skill.name: Graceful Touch
skill.description: When Intro Skill is cast, restores 4/5/6/7/8 Concerto Energy. When Outro Skill is cast, restores 4/5/6/7/8 Resonance Energy.

weapons.name: Tyro Broadblade
weapons.description: The onset of pinnacle pursuit. A broadblade designed for novice Resonators. Contains a power not to be underestimated under its simple outlook.

weapons.name: Training Broadblade
weapons.description: This broadblade is designed specifically for training and teaching, offering only the basic features.

skill.name: Persevere
skill.description: Increases ATK by 4%/5%/6%/7%/8%.

weapons.name: Emerald of Genesis
weapons.description: Pay heed: the frigid blade reveals an icy current, amalgamating into a whirlpool of thoughts. Use this powerful sequence to effortlessly crush your enemies with the Sword.

skill.name: Stormy Resolution
skill.description: Increases Energy Regen by 12.8%/16%/19.2%/22.4%/25.6%. When Resonance Skill is cast, increases ATK by 6%/7.5%/9%/10.5%/12%, stacking up to 2/2/2/2/2 time(s). This effect lasts for 10/10/10/10/10s.

weapons.name: Blazing Brilliance
weapons.description: Forged from the very essence and feathers of a legendary bird, this weapon blazes with an intensity that bathes the world in its luminous glow. With each fiery surge, it consumes all in its path, leaving nothing but ashes in its wake.

skill.name: Crimson Phoenix
skill.description: ATK increased by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24%. The wielder gains 1 stack of Searing Feather upon dealing damage, which can be triggered once every 0.5s, and gains 5 stacks of the same effect upon casting Resonance Skill. Each stack of Searing Feather gives 4%/5%/6%/7%/8% additional Resonance Skill DMG Bonus for up to 14 stacks. After reaching the max stacks, all stacks will be removed in 12/12/12/12/12s.

weapons.name: Red Spring
weapons.description: A camellia bud silently unfurls. As promised, she holds this infinite world in bloom in her palms, where fine crimson vines twine around her fingertips. The dull ache, like sand scratching against the heart, is proof of your fateful encounter.

skill.name: Beyond the Cycle
skill.description: Increase ATK by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24%. When dealing Basic Attack DMG, the wielder gains 10%/12.5%/15%/17.5%/20% Basic Attack DMG Bonus for 14/14/14/14/14s. This effect can be triggered once per second, stacking up to 3/3/3/3/3 times. When the wielder's Concerto Energy is consumed, gain 40%/50%/60%/70%/80% Basic DMG Bonus for 10/10/10/10/10. This effect can be triggered once per second and ends when the wielder is switched off the field.

weapons.name: Unflickering Valor
weapons.description: Blistering winds and crashing waves, the sea devours all. Only a lonely boat lamp stands alight! Onwards! Towards the edge of the world you shall sail!

skill.name: Laughter Prevails
skill.description: Increase Crit. Rate by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16%. Casting Resonance Liberation gives 24%/30%/36%/42%/48% Basic Attack DMG Bonus for 10/10/10/10/10s. Dealing Basic Attack DMG gives 24%/30%/36%/42%/48% Basic Attack DMG Bonus for 4/4/4/4/4s.

weapons.name: Overture
weapons.description: An ascending crescendo. This enchanting sword effortlessly cuts through anything in its way, like a glorious prelude.

skill.name: Ceaseless Aria
skill.description: When Resonance Skill is cast, restores 8/10/12/14/16 Concerto Energy. This effect can be triggered 1/1/1/1/1 time(s) every 20/20/20/20/20s.

weapons.name: Sword#18
weapons.description: An improved version of a mass-produced sword model developed in Huanglong. With its sleek blade and minimalist design, this sword is exclusively crafted for the skilled hands of seasoned warriors.

skill.name: Daybreak
skill.description: When the Resonator's HP drops below 40%/50%/60%/70%/80%, increases Heavy Attack DMG Bonus by 18%/22.5%/27%/31.5%/36% and gives 5%/6.25%/7.5%/8.75%/10% healing when dealing Heavy Attack DMG. This effect can be triggered 1/1/1/1/1 time(s) every 8/8/8/8/8s.

weapons.name: Commando of Conviction
weapons.description: A weapon designed to commemorate the Midnight Rangers' courage. "A thousand echoes carry the war's tale, as spirits unite in resounding gorges of valor.”

skill.name: Unyielding
skill.description: When Intro Skill is cast, increases ATK by 15%/18.75%/22.5%/26.25%/30%, lasting for 15/15/15/15/15s.

weapons.name: Lunar Cutter
weapons.description: The Sword born from the aerial phenomenon. The forger integrates the feelings of witnessing the alien star into the weapon, making it look light and sharp, but it can exert the energy of breaking the sky and cutting iron like mud.

skill.name: Preordained
skill.description: Equipped Resonator gains 6/6/6/6/6 stack(s) of Oath upon entering the battlefield. Each stack increases ATK by 2%/2.5%/3%/3.5%/4%, up to 6/6/6/6/6 stacks. This effect can be triggered 1/1/1/1/1 time(s) every 12/12/12/12/12s. The equipped Resonator loses 1/1/1/1/1 stack(s) of Oath every 2/2/2/2/2s, and gains 6/6/6/6/6 stack(s) upon defeating an enemy.

weapons.name: Lumingloss
weapons.description: This Sword is a ceremonial weapon used in Huanglong's Magistrate Inauguration Ceremonies. The golden ginkgo leaf pattern symbolizes Huanglong's resilience, thriving in a world that has left it behind.

skill.name: Pale Gale
skill.description: When Resonance Skill is cast, increases Basic Attack DMG Bonus and Heavy Attack DMG Bonus by 20%/31%/42%/53%/64%, stacking up to 1/1/1/1/1 time(s). This effect lasts for 10/10/10/10/10s and can be triggered 1/1/1/1/1 time(s) every 1/1/1/1/1s.

weapons.name: Endless Collapse
weapons.description: A prototype weapon designed by the Black Shores for elite combatants. This sword takes its name from the heart of a blazar—a galactic nucleus whose blinding radiance pierces the cosmos, shining unmistakably across billions of light years.

skill.name: Intergalactic Gaze
skill.description: Casting the Resonance Skill grants 6/7/8/9/10 Resonance Energy and increases ATK by 10%/12.5%/15%/17.5%/20%, lasting for 16/16/16/16/16s. This effect can be triggered once every 20/20/20/20/20s.

weapons.name: Somnoire Anchor
weapons.description: An anchor once used by Ivory Gatekeeper to stablize the Somnoire. However, it now looks different ever since Ivory Gatekeeper transformed into a white cat...

skill.name: Meow!
skill.description: Gain 1/1/1/1/1 stack of Hiss when dealing damage to the target, with 1/1/1/1/1 stack generated every 1/1/1/1/1s. Hiss: each stack increases the wielder's ATK by 2%/2.5%/3%/3.5%/4% for 3/3/3/3/3s, stacking up to 10/10/10/10/10 times. Switching off the wielder clears all stacks. Gaining 10/10/10/10/10 stacks increases the wielder's Crit. Rate by 6%/7.5%/9%/10.5%/12%.

weapons.name: Fables of Wisdom
weapons.description: This weapon draws its design inspiration from the play—Fables of Wisdom. A wayfarer once carried this sword, who spun fables of wisdom, passing on insights in the form of witty jests. Keen ears listened to the stories for the truth, while shallow minds heard only amusing punchlines.

skill.name: Rhetoric
skill.description: Dealing DMG to enemies with Negative Statuses increases the wielder's ATK by 4%/5%/6%/7%/8% for 10/10/10/10/10s. This effect can be triggered 1 time per second, stackable up to 4/4/4/4/4 times.

weapons.name: Sword of Night
weapons.description: May victory prevail the lasting night. In addition to the sworn oath of protection, this sword also represents the ambition of those brave souls.

skill.name: Valiance
skill.description: When Intro Skill is cast, increases ATK by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16%, lasting for 10/10/10/10/10s.

weapons.name: Originite: Type II
weapons.description: To create new Tacetite weapons, the Huaxu Academy designed this test Sword for technical verification. Its main feature is healing through attacks, improving the physical abilities of Resonators while exhibiting impressive weapon performance.

skill.name: Vanquish
skill.description: When Resonance Liberation is cast, heals 5%/6.25%/7.5%/8.75%/10% of the Resonator's Max HP. This effect can be triggered 1/1/1/1/1 time(s) every 20/20/20/20/20s.

weapons.name: Sword of Voyager
weapons.description: The Sword provided by the Pioneer Association for the voyagers is bright in color, not easy to lose, hard in texture, and can cope with various extreme environments for a long time, and is very popular among the group of explorers.

skill.name: Crusade
skill.description: When Resonance Skill is cast, restores 8/9/10/11/12 Resonance Energy. This effect can be triggered 1/1/1/1/1 time(s) every 20/20/20/20/20s.

weapons.name: Guardian Sword
weapons.description: The first Jinzhou Magistrate, in memory of the mysterious person who helped defend the border and build the city, created the Guardian series under his guidance. Today, it has become an indispensable cornerstone for the development of new weapons.

skill.name: Unified
skill.description: Resonance Skill DMG Bonus is increased by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24%.

weapons.name: Tyro Sword
weapons.description: The birth of revolutionary tides. A sword designed for novice Resonators. Contains a power not to be underestimated under its simple outlook.

weapons.name: Training Sword
weapons.description: This sword is designed specifically for training and teaching, offering only the basic features.

skill.name: Persevere
skill.description: Increases ATK by 4%/5%/6%/7%/8%.

weapons.name: Static Mist
weapons.description: Grip the sleek frame and feel its cool surface as you aim down the sight. With a pull of the trigger, unleash a thick smoke barrage onto the battlefield with these powerful Pistols in your hands.

skill.name: Stormy Resolution
skill.description: Increases Energy Regen by 12.8%/16%/19.2%/22.4%/25.6%. Incoming Resonator's ATK is increased by 10%/12.5%/15%/17.5%/20% for 14/14/14/14/14s, stackable for up to 1/1/1/1/1 times after the wielder casts Outro Skill.

weapons.name: The Last Dance
weapons.description: The radiant crystals, ever shattering and reshaping, beckon you into a treacherous dance, a gamble where life is the wager. Cortado, cortado... relentlessly draw each other in until all we can hear are our quivers. When the crimson finale arrives, remember, death comes for all.

skill.name: Silent Eulogy
skill.description: Increases ATK by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24%. Every time Intro Skill or Resonance Liberation is cast, Resonance Skill DMG Bonus increases by 48%/60%/72%/84%/96% for 5/5/5/5/5s.

weapons.name: Cadenza
weapons.description: An ascending crescendo. These pistols unleash bullets with the force of thunder, tearing through the heavens like a symphony of destruction.

skill.name: Ceaseless Aria
skill.description: When Resonance Skill is cast, restores 8/10/12/14/16 Concerto Energy. This effect can be triggered 1/1/1/1/1 times every 20/20/20/20/20s.

weapons.name: Undying Flame
weapons.description: A weapon designed to commemorate the Midnight Rangers' dedication. "Let my body ablaze, flames dance to banish all evil's haze."

skill.name: Loyalty
skill.description: When Intro Skill is cast, increases Resonance Skill DMG Bonus by 20%/25%/30%/35%/40% for 15/15/15/15/15s.

weapons.name: Novaburst
weapons.description: Pistols born from the strange phenomena in the sky. The forger infused the weapon with the feelings from witnessing the strange star, making it look hollow and light, yet extremely stable, with the power of thunder when it fires.

skill.name: Ever-changing
skill.description: When the Resonator dashes or dodges, increases ATK by 4%/5%/6%/7%/8%, stacking up to 3/3/3/3/3 time(s). This effect lasts for 8/8/8/8/8s.

weapons.name: Pistols#26
weapons.description: The Huaxu Academy has developed practical, high-performance pistols based on previous source energy weapons, showcasing their meticulous research and aiming for excellence.

skill.name: Omniscient
skill.description: When the Resonator takes no damage, increases ATK by 6%/7.5%/9%/10.5%/12% every 5/5/5/5/5s, stacking up to 2/2/2/2/2 time(s). This effect lasts for 8/8/8/8/8s. When the Resonator takes damage, loses 1/1/1/1/1 stacks and heals 5%/6.25%/7.5%/8.75%/10% of their Max HP.

weapons.name: Thunderbolt
weapons.description: These Pistols are ceremonial weapons used in Huanglong's Magistrate Inauguration Ceremonies. The golden ginkgo leaf pattern symbolizes Huanglong's resilience, thriving in a world that has left it behind.

skill.name: Unstoppable
skill.description: When hitting a target with Basic Attacks or Heavy Attacks, increases Resonance Skill DMG Bonus by 7%/11%/15%/19%/23%, stacking up to 3/3/3/3/3 time(s). This effect lasts for 10/10/10/10/10s and can be triggered 1/1/1/1/1 time(s) every 1/1/1/1/1s.

weapons.name: Relativistic Jet
weapons.description: A prototype weapon designed by the Black Shores for elite combatants. These pistols take their name from the incessant course of destruction of a blazar—a galactic nucleus whose blinding radiance pierces the cosmos, shining unmistakably across billions of light years.

skill.name: Intergalactic Gaze
skill.description: Casting the Resonance Skill grants 6/7/8/9/10 Resonance Energy and increases ATK by 10%/12.5%/15%/17.5%/20%, lasting for 16/16/16/16/16s. This effect can be triggered once every 20/20/20/20/20s.

weapons.name: Romance in Farewell
weapons.description: This weapon draws its design inspiration from the play—Romance in Farewell. This pistol was once the symbol of the aspiration for repute, the weight of unrequited love, and the tremors of unspoken words. When the trigger is pulled, and the curtain drops, it turns into a long farewell and a sign of lingering sorrow in the heart of the bereaved.

skill.name: Rhetoric
skill.description: Dealing DMG to enemies with Negative Statuses increases the wielder's ATK by 4%/5%/6%/7%/8% for 10/10/10/10/10s. This effect can be triggered 1 time per second, stackable up to 4/4/4/4/4 times.

weapons.name: Pistols of Night
weapons.description: May victory prevail the lasting night. This type of pistols not only carries the oath of protection but also contains the hope of rejuvenation.

skill.name: Valiance
skill.description: When Intro Skill is cast, increases ATK by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16%, lasting for 10/10/10/10/10s.

weapons.name: Guardian Pistols
weapons.description: The first Jinzhou Magistrate, in memory of the mysterious person who helped defend the border and build the city, created the Guardian series under his guidance. Now, it has become the cornerstone of the development of new weapons.

skill.name: Unity
skill.description: Resonance Skill DMG Bonus is increased by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24%.

weapons.name: Originite: Type III
weapons.description: To create new Tacetite weapons, the Huaxu Academy designed these test Pistols for technical verification. Their main feature is healing through attacks, improving the physical abilities of Resonators while exhibiting impressive weapon performance.

skill.name: Alarcrity
skill.description: When Dodge Counter is cast, heals 1.6%/2%/2.4%/2.8%/3.2% of the Resonator's Max HP. This effect can be triggered 1/1/1/1/1 time(s) every 6/6/6/6/6s.

weapons.name: Pistols of Voyager
weapons.description: The Pistols provided by the Pioneer Association for the far walkers, with bright colors, not easy to lose, hard texture, can cope with various extreme environments for a long time, and is very popular among the explorer group.

skill.name: Long Journey
skill.description: When Resonance Skill is cast, restores 8/9/10/11/12 Resonance Energy. This effect can be triggered 1/1/1/1/1 time(s) every 20/20/20/20/20s.

weapons.name: Tyro Pistols
weapons.description: The inception of valiant venture. A pair of pistols designed for novice Resonators. Contains a power not to be underestimated under its simple outlook.

weapons.name: Training Pistols
weapons.description: These pistols are designed specifically for training and teaching, offering only the basic features.

skill.name: Persevere
skill.description: Increases ATK by 4%/5%/6%/7%/8%.

weapons.name: Abyss Surges
weapons.description: The Gauntlets pulsate with an uncontrollable force, emanating unspeakable anger from the depths of the unknown lake. As you don them, unleash your fury on helpless enemies. Feel its power surge through you.

skill.name: Stormy Resolution
skill.description: Increases Energy Regen by 12.8%/16%/19.2%/22.4%/25.6%. When hitting a target with Resonance Skill, increases Basic Attack DMG Bonus by 10%/12.5%/15%/17.5%/20%, lasting for 8/8/8/8/8s. When hitting a target with Basic Attacks, increases Resonance Skill DMG Bonus by 10%/12.5%/15%/17.5%/20%, lasting for 8/8/8/8/8s.

weapons.name: Verity's Handle
weapons.description: Crafted with the lost art from the Court of Savantae, these gauntlets are solid and unbreakable, despite their lightweight materials. They are no tools of violence or aggression, but instruments for unraveling puzzles and pursuing the truth.

skill.name: Ad Veritatem
skill.description: Gain 12%/15%/18%/21%/24% Attribute DMG Bonus. When using Resonance Liberation, the wielder gains 48%/60%/72%/84%/96% Resonance Liberation DMG Bonus for 8/8/8/8/8s. This effect can be extended by 5/5/5/5/5s each time Resonance Skills are cast, up to 3/3/3/3/3 times.

weapons.name: Tragicomedy
weapons.description: The joys and sorrows of life dance in an endless circle; Pain and tears shift in an instant into a carnival.

skill.name: Fool's Warble
skill.description: Increases ATK by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24%. Every time Basic Attack or Intro Skill is cast, Heavy Attack DMG Bonus increases by 48%/60%/72%/84%/96% for 3/3/3/3/3s.

weapons.name: Marcato
weapons.description: A descending adagio. These gauntlets pulsate with the power of surging waves, shattering anything in their path like a deadly hymn.

skill.name: Ceaseless Aria
skill.description: When Resonance Skill is cast, restores 8/10/12/14/16 Concerto Energy. This effect can be triggered 1/1/1/1/1 times every 20/20/20/20/20s.

weapons.name: Amity Accord
weapons.description: A weapon designed to commemorate the Midnight Rangers' comradeship. "Thin garments yield to icy moons, while armor withstands the chill of stars."

skill.name: Camaraderie
skill.description: When Intro Skill is cast, increases Resonance Liberation DMG Bonus by 20%/25%/30%/35%/40%, lasting for 15/15/15/15/15s.

weapons.name: Gauntlets#21D
weapons.description: Huaxu Academy has independently improved and developed the first set of highly practical high-performance Gauntlets based on the previous source energy weapons, representing the care and warmth of the Academy, stable and lasting.

skill.name: Mastermind
skill.description: When the Resonator dashes or dodges, increases ATK by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16%. Increases Dodge Counter DMG by 50%/62.5%/75%/87.5%/100%, lasting for 8/8/8/8/8s. When Dodge Counter is performed, heals 5%/6.25%/7.5%/8.75%/10% of the Resonator's Max HP. This effect can be triggered 1/1/1/1/1 time(s) every 6/6/6/6/6s.

weapons.name: Stonard
weapons.description: These Gauntlets are ceremonial weapons used in Huanglong's Magistrate Inauguration Ceremonies. The golden ginkgo leaf pattern symbolizes Huanglong's resilience, thriving in a world that has left it behind.

skill.name: Wallbreaker
skill.description: Casting Resonance Skill increases the wielder's Resonance Liberation DMG Bonus by 18%/27%/36%/45%/54%, lasting for 15/15/15/15/15s.

weapons.name: Hollow Mirage
weapons.description: The Gauntlets born from the strange phenomenon in the sky. The blacksmith infused the feelings of witnessing the strange star into the weapon, making it look hollow and light, but it can exert a tremendous momentum while protecting the user.

skill.name: Celestial Blessing
skill.description: When Resonance Liberation is cast, grants 3/3/3/3/3 stack(s) of Iron Armor. Each stack increases ATK and DEF by 3%/3.5%/4%/4.5%/5%, stacking up to 3/3/3/3/3 time(s). When the Resonator takes damage, reduces the number of stacks by 1/1/1/1/1.

weapons.name: Celestial Spiral
weapons.description: A prototype weapon designed by the Black Shores for elite combatants. These gauntlets take their name from the tragic demise of a blazar—a galactic nucleus whose blinding radiance pierces the cosmos, shining unmistakably across billions of light years.

skill.name: Intergalactic Gaze
skill.description: Casting the Resonance Skill grants 6/7/8/9/10 Resonance Energy and increases ATK by 10%/12.5%/15%/17.5%/20%, lasting for 16/16/16/16/16s. This effect can be triggered once every 20/20/20/20/20s.

weapons.name: Legend of Drunken Hero
weapons.description: This weapon draws its design inspiration from the play—Legend of Drunken Hero. From the cup flows a liquid that grants courage and strength, empowering the hero to defy fate and turn the tide with his gauntlets. Yet in this intoxicating delight lies peril—dulled senses become the hero's undoing as enemies close in. Thus, in those wine-stained pages, one always read about triumphs followed by defeats.

skill.name: Rhetoric
skill.description: Dealing DMG to enemies with Negative Statuses increases the wielder's ATK by 4%/5%/6%/7%/8% for 10/10/10/10/10s. This effect can be triggered 1 time per second, stackable up to 4/4/4/4/4 times.

weapons.name: Gauntlets of Night
weapons.description: May victory prevail the lasting night. In addition to the sworn oath of protection, these gauntlets also commemorate the sacrifices of those brave souls.

skill.name: Valiance
skill.description: When Intro Skill is cast, increases ATK by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16%, lasting for 10/10/10/10/10s.

weapons.name: Guardian Gauntlets
weapons.description: The first Jinzhou Magistrate, in memory of the mysterious person who helped defend the border and build the city, created the Guardian series under his guidance. Now, it has become the cornerstone of the development of new weapons.

skill.name: Collective Strength
skill.description: Increases Resonance Liberation DMG Bonus by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24%.

weapons.name: Originite: Type IV
weapons.description: To create new Tacetite weapons, the Huaxu Academy designed these test Gauntlets for technical verification. Their main feature is healing through attacks, improving the physical abilities of Resonators while exhibiting impressive weapon performance.

skill.name: Rejuvinate
skill.description: When dealing Basic Attack DMG, heals 0.5%/0.65%/0.8%/0.95%/1.1% of the Resonator's Max HP. This effect can be triggered 1/1/1/1/1 time(s) every 3/3/3/3/3s.

weapons.name: Gauntlets of Voyager
weapons.description: The Gauntlets provided by the Pioneer Association for the far walkers, with bright colors, not easy to lose, hard texture, can cope with various extreme environments for a long time, and are very popular among the explorer group.

skill.name: Crusade
skill.description: When Resonance Skill is cast, restores 8/9/10/11/12 Resonance Energy. This effect can be triggered 1/1/1/1/1 time(s) every 20/20/20/20/20s.

weapons.name: Tyro Gauntlets
weapons.description: The dawn of enduring endeavor. A pair of gauntlets designed for novice Resonators. Contains a power not to be underestimated under its simple outlook.

weapons.name: Training Gauntlets
weapons.description: These gauntlets are designed specifically for training and teaching, offering only the basic features.

skill.name: Persevere
skill.description: Increases ATK by 4%/5%/6%/7%/8%.

weapons.name: Cosmic Ripples
weapons.description: Take hold of the frozen Rectifier, a powerful tool imbued with the energy of the celestial lake. Let it lead you to ultimate knowledge and vanquish all obstacles in your path.

skill.name: Stormy Resolution
skill.description: Increases Energy Regen by 12.8%/16%/19.2%/22.4%/25.6%. When dealing Basic Attack DMG, increases Basic Attack DMG Bonus by 3.2%/4%/4.8%/5.6%/6.4%, stacking up to 5/5/5/5/5 time(s). This effect lasts for 8/8/8/8/8s and can be triggered 1/1/1/1/1 time(s) every 0.5/0.5/0.5/0.5/0.5s.

weapons.name: Stringmaster
weapons.description: The puppet's palm unfurls, releasing deadly strings with a menacing hum. The air crackles, immobilizing foes and leaving unhealable scars from rapid electric bolts.

skill.name: Electric Amplification
skill.description: Grants 12%/15%/18%/21%/24% Attribute DMG Bonus. When dealing Resonance Skill DMG, increases ATK by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24%, stacking up to 2/2/2/2/2 times. This effect lasts for 5/5/5/5/5s. When the wielder is not on the field, increases their ATK by an additional 12%/15%/18%/21%/24%.

weapons.name: Rime-Draped Sprouts
weapons.description: An artist's seal adorned with rimed sprouts. It is stamped on numerous paintings that capture mountains and ravines in expressive, mesmerizing strokes. The tender sprouts symbolize the perpetual blossoming of artistic marvels.

skill.name: Panorama
skill.description: Increase ATK by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24%. While the wielder is on the field, using Resonance Skill grants 12%/15%/18%/21%/24% Basic Attack DMG Bonus, stacking up to 3/3/3/3/3 times for 6/6/6/6/6s. At 3/3/3/3/3 stacks or above, casting Outro Skill consumes all stacks of this effect and grants the wielder 52%/65%/78%/91%/104% Basic Attack DMG Bonus for 27/27/27/27/27s, effective when the wielder is off the field.

weapons.name: Stellar Symphony
weapons.description: A rectifier bearing an energy core that simulates the lifecycle of stars—an infinite loop that originates from a singularity and ends in explosive demise. The celestial debris collides in thunderous rumbles, heralding the birth of a new star.

skill.name: Astral Evolvement
skill.description: Increase HP by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24%. Restore 8/10/12/14/16 Concerto Energy when casting Resonance Liberation. This effect can be triggered 1/1/1/1/1 time(s) every 20/20/20/20/20s. When casting Resonance Skill that heals, increase nearby party members' ATK by 14%/17.5%/21%/24.5%/28% for 30/30/30/30/30s. Effects of the same name cannot be stacked.

weapons.name: Luminous Hymn
weapons.description: "The Sentinel's grace, how sweet thou art. Our home was lost, but found at last. With twigs between my beaks, I brave the waves. Bound by love, we're crowned with holy light."

skill.name: Homebuilder's Anthem
skill.description: Increase ATK by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24%. Dealing DMG to targets with Spectro Frazzle grants the wielder 14%/17.5%/21%/24.5%/28% Basic Attack DMG Bonus and 14%/17.5%/21%/24.5%/28% Heavy Attack DMG Bonus, stacking up to 3/3/3/3/3 times for 6/6/6/6/6s. Casting Outro Skill Amplifies the Spectro Frazzle DMG on targets around the active Resonator by 30%/37.5%/45%/52.5%/60% for 30/30/30/30/30s. Effects of the same name cannot be stacked.

weapons.name: Whispers of Sirens
weapons.description: From the sea, some see stars, some catch the moon, and some hear countless whispers and murmurs. Those murmurs seep into her venom, flowing through every winding river. In the end, the murmurs envelope, like the bell of a jellyfish, like the sea.

skill.name: Astral Evolvement
skill.description: Increases ATK by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24%. Casting Echo Skill within 10/10/10/10/10s after casting Intro Skill grants 1/1/1/1/1 stacks of Gentle Dreams. Echoes with the same name can only trigger this effect once, stacking up to 3/3/3/3/3 times, lasting for 10/10/10/10/10s. Switching to another Resonator ends this effect early. With 1/1/1/1/1 stack: Grant 40%/50%/60%/70%/80% Basic Attack DMG Bonus. With 2/2/2/2/2 stack: Ignore 10%/12.5%/15%/17.5%/20% of the target's Havoc RES. With 3/3/3/3/3 stack: The wielder gains 40%/50%/60%/70%/80% Basic Attack DMG Bonus and ignores 10%/12.5%/15%/17.5%/20% of the target's Havoc RES for 27/27/27/27/27s when Gentle Dream ends early. Switching back to the wielder ends the effect immediately.

weapons.name: Variation
weapons.description: A descending adagio. This rectifier opens up an insightful window into the situation, changing the tune of the intense battle concerto.

skill.name: Ceaseless Aria
skill.description: When Resonance Skill is cast, restores 8/10/12/14/16 Concerto Energy. This effect can be triggered 1/1/1/1/1 times every 20/20/20/20/20s.

weapons.name: Rectifier#25
weapons.description: An improved version of a Rectifier prototype from Huanglong's next-gen weaponry project. This device is characterized by its powerful, purified output and sound that resonates with the decisively strong-willed.

skill.name: Dawnbringer
skill.description: When Resonance Skill is cast, if the Resonator's HP is below 60%/60%/60%/60%/60%, heals 5%/6.25%/7.5%/8.75%/10% of their Max HP. This effect can be triggered 1/1/1/1/1 time(s) every 8/8/8/8/8s. If the Resonator's HP is above 60%/60%/60%/60%/60%, increases ATK by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24%, lasting for 10/10/10/10/10s.

weapons.name: Jinzhou Keeper
weapons.description: A weapon designed to commemorate the Midnight Rangers' vigilant protection of Jinzhou. "Cast your gaze towards the north, where the city's silhouette fades, its gates veiled by the tranquil rain."

skill.name: Guardian
skill.description: Casting Intro Skill increases the wielder's ATK by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16% and HP by 10%/12.5%/15%/17.5%/20%, lasting for 15/15/15/15/15s.

weapons.name: Comet Flare
weapons.description: A Rectifier born born from an aerial phenomenon. Capturing the essence of an alien star, its design is delicate and lightweight, yet it remains sturdy and adaptable.

skill.name: Luminous Protection
skill.description: When dealing Basic Attack DMG or Heavy Attack DMG, increases Healing Bonus by 3%/3.75%/4.5%/5.25%/6%, stacking up to 3/3/3/3/3 time(s). This effect lasts for 8/8/8/8/8s and can be triggered 1/1/1/1/1 time(s) every 0.6/0.6/0.6/0.6/0.6s.

weapons.name: Augment
weapons.description: This Rectifier is a ceremonial weapon used in Huanglong's Magistrate Inauguration Ceremonies. The golden ginkgo leaf pattern symbolizes Huanglong's resilience, thriving in a world that has left it behind.

skill.name: Forgiving Resilience
skill.description: Casting Resonance Liberation increases the wielder's ATK by 15%/23.25%/31.5%/39.75%/48%, lasting for 15/15/15/15/15s.

weapons.name: Fusion Accretion
weapons.description: A prototype weapon designed by the Black Shores for elite combatants. This rectifier takes its name from the devastating might of a blazar—a galactic nucleus whose blinding radiance pierces the cosmos, shining unmistakably across billions of light years.

skill.name: Intergalactic Gaze
skill.description: Casting the Resonance Skill grants 6/7/8/9/10 Resonance Energy and increases ATK by 10%/12.5%/15%/17.5%/20%, lasting for 16/16/16/16/16s. This effect can be triggered once every 20/20/20/20/20s.

weapons.name: Call of the Abyss
weapons.description: Held by the keepers of this land, this scepter was once a symbol of dominion over its people and the architectural marvels they achieved. However, it has long lost its luster, and its grandeur blends into the ripples of the pipe organ melodies of Rinascita.

skill.name: Pole of the Celestial Dome
skill.description: Casting Resonance Liberation increases the Resonator's Healing Bonus by 16%/20%/24%/28%/32% for 15/15/15/15/15s.

weapons.name: Waltz in Masquerade
weapons.description: This weapon draws its design inspiration from the play—Waltz in Masquerade. A waltz is a dance of spectacle and masquerade, where the grand symphony drowns whispered secrets and swirling dresses conceal the exchange of letters and promises. The dancers speak a silent language, as smooth and precise as the perfect resonance of a rectifier.

skill.name: Rhetoric
skill.description: Dealing DMG to enemies with Negative Statuses increases the wielder's ATK by 4%/5%/6%/7%/8% for 10/10/10/10/10s. This effect can be triggered 1 time per second, stackable up to 4/4/4/4/4 times.

weapons.name: Ocean's Gift
weapons.description: To fishers, the sea is their field of harvest. Harvest means hope.

skill.name: Fish Catch
skill.description: Dealing DMG to enemies with Spectro Frazzle increases the wielder's Spectro DMG by 6%/7%/8%/9%/10%, gaining 1 stack per second for 6s, stacking up to 4 times.

weapons.name: Rectifier of Night
weapons.description: May victory prevail the lasting night. In addition to the sworn oath of protection, this rectifier signifies the confidence of those fighting souls.

skill.name: Valiance
skill.description: When Intro Skill is cast, increases ATK by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16%, lasting for 10/10/10/10/10s.

weapons.name: Originite: Type V
weapons.description: To create new Tacetite weapons, the Huaxu Academy designed this test Rectifier for technical verification. Its main feature is healing through attacks, improving the physical abilities of Resonators while exhibiting impressive weapon performance.

skill.name: Augment
skill.description: When Intro Skill is cast, heals 5%/6.25%/7.5%/8.75%/10% of the Resonator's Max HP. This effect can be triggered 1/1/1/1/1 time(s) every 20/20/20/20/20s.

weapons.name: Rectifier of Voyager
weapons.description: The Rectifier provided by the Pioneer Association for the explorers, with bright colors, not easy to lose, hard texture, can cope with various extreme environments for a long time, is very popular among the explorers.

skill.name: Crusade
skill.description: When Resonance Skill is cast, restores 8/9/10/11/12 Resonance Energy. This effect can be triggered 1/1/1/1/1 time(s) every 20/20/20/20/20s.

weapons.name: Guardian Rectifier
weapons.description: The first Jinzhou Magistrate, in memory of the mysterious person who helped defend the border and build the city, created the Guardian series under his guidance. Now, it has become the cornerstone of the development of new weapons.

skill.name: Companionship
skill.description: Increases Basic Attack and Heavy Attack DMG Bonus by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24%.

weapons.name: Tyro Rectifier
weapons.description: The origin of universal genesis. A Rectifier designed for novice Resonators. Contains a power not to be underestimated under its simple outlook.

weapons.name: Training Rectifier
weapons.description: This rectifier is designed specifically for training and teaching, offering only the basic features.

skill.name: Persevere
skill.description: Increases ATK by 4%/5%/6%/7%/8%.
